formalpara.title: SimpleShootistTest
formalpara.para: The important thing about this test is that when the application gets deployed the servletInitialized() method will be called, so the sip client should be ready to respond to any request. That means that we have to place the test archive in manual mode and control the deployment/undeployment ourselves. Also since we need to pass context parameters in some of the test methods, we have to place the container in manual mode also.

formalpara.title: SimpleShootmeTest
formalpara.para: Here the test methods will initiate any request, so the framework can manage the test archive and decide when to deploy/undeploy. Also the container can be left to auto mode, since we don't need to manually control it (to pass context parameters or change any of the container's configuration for example).
